verses.verse: (For the choir director, for Jeduthun. A Psalm of David.) I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H8104>guard<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> That I may not <S%H2398>sin<s%> with my <S%H3956>tongue;<s%> I will <S%H8104>guard<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> as with a <S%H4269>muzzle,<s%> <S%H5750>While<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are in my <S%H5048>presence.<s%>"
I was <S%H481>dumb<s%> and <S%H1747>silent,<s%> I <S%H2814>refrained<s%> [even] from <S%H9185>good;<s%> And my <S%H3511>sorrow<s%> <S%H5916>grew<s%> <S%H5916>worse.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2552>hot<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me; While I was <S%H1901>musing<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burned;<s%> [Then] I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with my tongue: <S%H3956><s%>

<S%H3068>"Lord,<s%> make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H7093>end,<s%> And <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H4060>extent<s%> of my <S%H3117>days,<s%> Let me <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H2310>transient<s%> I am.

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> Thou hast <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> [as] <S%H2947>handbreadths,<s%> And my <S%H2465>lifetime<s%> as <S%H369>nothing<s%> in Thy <S%H5048>sight,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> at his <S%H5324>best<s%> is a <S%H3605>mere<s%> <S%H1892>breath.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H389>"Surely<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> about as a <S%H6754>phantom;<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> they <S%H1993>make<s%> an <S%H1993>uproar<s%> for <S%H1892>nothing;<s%> He <S%H6651>amasses<s%> [riches], and does not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H622>gather<s%> them.
"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> for <S%H4100>what<s%> do I <S%H6960>wait<s%>? My <S%H8431>hope<s%> is in Thee.
<S%H5337>"Deliver<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> <S%H7760>Make<s%> me not the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5036>foolish.<s%>
"I have <S%H481>become<s%> <S%H481>dumb,<s%> I do not <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> it is Thou who hast <S%H6213>done<s%> [it.]
<S%H5493>"Remove<s%> Thy <S%H5061>plague<s%> from me; <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H8409>opposition<s%> of Thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> I am <S%H3615>perishing.<s%>

"With <S%H9640>reproofs<s%> Thou dost <S%H3256>chasten<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> Thou dost <S%H4529>consume<s%> as a <S%H6211>moth<s%> what is <S%H2530>precious<s%> to him; <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is a <S%H1892>mere<s%> <S%H1892>breath.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H8085>"Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H238>give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H7775>cry;<s%> Do not be <S%H2790>silent<s%> at my <S%H1832>tears;<s%> For I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> with Thee, A <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> like <S%H3605>all<s%> my fathers.
<S%H8159>"Turn<s%> Thy <S%H8159>gaze<s%> <S%H8159>away<s%> from me, that I may <S%H1082>smile<s%> [again], <S%H2962>Before<s%> I <S%H1980>depart<s%> and am <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more.<s%>"
